Question & Options:
What notable aspect of the movie 'Veer-Zaara', released in 2004, is highlighted in its soundtrack?
Options:
A. It features 11 songs composed by Madan Mohan.
B. It includes a single song performed by a famous pop artist.
C. The soundtrack was only released digitally.
D. It has no songs and is purely instrumental.
Correct Answer: It features 11 songs composed by Madan Mohan.
